message:
Should your paper be accepted, all images will published under Creative Commons Attribution License (CCAL) CC BY 4.0.
PLOS ONE is unable to publish previously copyrighted maps or satellite images, or images created using proprietary data.
Google和Baidu的地图都有版权，不能用在论文里，有没有无版权的电子地图？具体是要山东半岛及附近海域，无汉字地名图例标注最好了，或者是英文版的也行。
title: 求无版权的电子地图
